name: NPC behavior construction
description: The presence of autonomous agents could increase the richness and liveliness of autonomous worlds. In this talk we explore user-defined logic applied specifically to describing the behavior of autonomous agents. We retrace the evolution in abstraction and user interface for NPC behavior construction in Shoshin, review the findings, and lay down future possibilities.

speakers.name: guiltygyoza
speakers.bio: Cofounder at Topology. Worked on Isaac, MuMu, Shoshin, among other experiments. Exploring limitations and possibilities in world computing.
